data.text: God ga helekai gi Jacob, “Hana gi Bethel dolomeenei, gaa noho i golo. Hagaduulia i golo di gowaa hai tigidaumaha mai gi di Au, go di God dela ne haga gila adu do madagoaa nogo lele gi daha mo do duaahina go Esau.”
Jacob ga helekai gi dono madahaanau mo digau huogodoo i dono baahi, “Kilia gi daha nia god gee ala i godou baahi, haga madammaa ina goodou, ulu nia gahu mmaa.
Gidaadou ga hagatanga gaa hula gi Bethel, gei au ga hagaduu aga di gowaa hai tigidaumaha ang gi di God dela ne hagamaamaa au i ogu haingadaa ge nogo madalia au i nia gowaa huogodoo ne hana ginai au.”
Digaula gaa wanga gi Jacob nadau god gee huogodoo, mo nia buulei dalinga nogo ulu ginaadou. Gei Jacob gaa danu nia maa i lala di laagau ‘oak’ hoohoo gi Shechem.
Di madagoaa a Jacob mo ana dama daane ne daamada ga hagatanga, di madagu damanaiee gu i hongo nia daangada o nia waahale ala e hoohoo mai, gei digaula digi waluwalu ina digaula.
Jacob ne hanimoi mo ana daangada huogodoo gi Luz dela dolomeenei e haga ingoo bolo Bethel i Canaan.
Mee gaa hau dana gowaa hai tigidaumaha i golo, ga haga ingoo di gowaa gi di God o Bethel, idimaa God gu hagagila Ia gi mee i golo i dono lele gi daha mo dono duaahina.
Deborah, go di hege ahina madua Rebecca, guu made, gaa danu i lala di laagau ‘oak’ i bahi i ngaaga Bethel. Deelaa di hai di laagau deelaa ne hagaingoo bolo di “Laagau ‘Oak’ o di Madatangi.”
Di madagoaa Jacob ne hanimoi gi muli i Mesopotamia, God ga haga gila gi mee labelaa, ga haga humalia a mee.
God ga helekai gi mee, “Do ingoo lago Jacob, gei dolomeenei gaa huli gi muli, do ingoo gaa hai bolo Israel.” Malaa, God gu hagaingoo a mee bolo Israel.
God ga helekai gi mee, “Au go di God Mogobuna. Hagadilia gi dogologo. Nia henua llauehe ga hagadili mai i di goe, gei goe gaa hai tamana madua o nia king.
Au ga gowadu tenua ne wanga ko Au gi Abraham mo Isaac, e wanga labelaa gi o hagadili i oo muli.”
Nomuli, gei God gaa hana gi daha mo mee.
Gei Jacob ga hagaduu aga dana hadu hagalangahia i golo, i di gowaa dela ne helekai a God gi mee, ga hagatulu ginai nia waini mono lolo olib e haga dabu di maa.
Mee ga hagaingoo di gowaa deelaa bolo Bethel.
Jacob mo dono madahaanau ga hagatanga i Bethel. Di nadau madagoaa e mogowaa i Ephrath, Rachel gu dau mai dono madagoaa belee haanau, geia nogo mmae huoloo.
Dono mmae ne damanaiee, di ahina hagahaanau a maa ga helekai gi mee, “Rachel, goe hudee madagu, ma tama daane labelaa.”

Gei Rachel e dogi haga muliagina idimaa mee dela la gaa made, gei mee gaa gahi dana dama daane bolo Benoni,35.18 Benoni: Di ingoo deenei dono hadinga i nnelekai Hebrew boloo, “Tama o dogu Hagaduadua”. gei tamana o maa ga haga ingoo a mee bolo Benjamin.35.18 Benjamin: Di ingoo deenei dono hadinga i nnelekai Hebrew boloo, “Tama dela ga Haadanga lamalia”.
Di madagoaa Rachel ne made, mee ne danu i baahi di ala e hana gi Ephrath, di waahale e hai bolo Bethlehem dolomeenei.
Jacob ga hagaduu dana hadu hagalangahia i golo, e haga ingoo mai gi dangi nei bolo di lua ni Rachel.
Jacob ga hagamenege ga hagaduu ono hale laa di baahi gi golo o di angulaa i Eder.
Di madagoaa Jacob nogo noho i tenua deelaa, Reuben guu hai di hai hagahailodo gi Bilhah, di ahina i nia lodo hege dono damana. Jacob ga longono, gu hagawelewele huoloo.35.22 Genesis 49.4
Nia dama daane Leah:
Nia dama daane Rachel:
Nia dama daane Bilhah, di hege Rachel:
Nia dama daane Zilpah, di hege a Leah:
Jacob gaa hana gi dono damana go Isaac i Mamre, hoohoo gi Hebron, di gowaa nogo noho ai Abraham mo Isaac.35.27 Genesis 13.18
Isaac nogo mouli nia ngadau e 180,
gaa made i dono madua, ge ana dama daane go Esau mo Jacob gaa danu a mee.
